mapper.select: SELECT A.Order_lNo, A.Order_lCus_No, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME Order_lName, A.Order_lCode, B.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 Order_STND_1, E.Child_TBL_Type as Order_Product_Unit, A.Order_lQty, A.Order_lSum, A.Order_lUnit_Price, A.Order_lPrice, A.Order_lNot_Stocked, D.Order_mDlvry_Date as Order_Dlvry_Date, A.Order_Rcv_Clsfc, C.Child_TBL_Type Order_Rcv_Clsfc_Name, A.Order_lInfo_Remark FROM OrderList_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.Order_lCode = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL C on A.Order_Rcv_Clsfc = C.Child_TBL_No inner join OrderMaster_tbl D on A.Order_lCus_No = D.Order_mCus_No inner join DTL_TBL E on B.Product_Unit = E.Child_TBL_No where Order_lCus_No = #{OrderNo} Order by Order_lNo
mapper.insert: insert into OrderList_tbl( Order_lNo, Order_lCus_No, Order_lCode, Order_lQty, Order_lSum, Order_lUnit_Price, Order_lPrice, Order_lNot_Stocked, Order_Rcv_Clsfc, Order_lInfo_Remark )values( (select ifnull(max(AA.Order_lNo)+1,1) from OrderList_tbl AS AA where AA.Order_lCus_No = #{Order_lCus_No}), #{Order_lCus_No}, #{Order_lCode}, #{Order_lQty}, #{Order_lSum}, #{Order_lUnit_Price}, #{Order_lPrice}, #{Order_lQty}, #{Order_Rcv_Clsfc}, #{Order_lInfo_Remark} )on duplicate key update Order_lQty = #{Order_lQty}, Order_lUnit_Price = #{Order_lUnit_Price}, Order_lPrice = #{Order_lPrice}, Order_lNot_Stocked = #{Order_lQty}, Order_Rcv_Clsfc = #{Order_Rcv_Clsfc}, Order_lInfo_Remark = #{Order_lInfo_Remark}
